Cover                                    : Yes
Lyrics                                   : [00:10.96]Wheels up, when I'm off the ground / [00:12.70]I'm nowhere but I'm all around / [00:14.88]I'm spinnin', watch me now / [00:17.14]I'm spinnin', spinnin' / [00:19.79]Big man when a wall's between us / [00:21.99]Big man gonna break to pieces / [00:24.10]Spinnin', can't believe it / [00:26.38]Spinnin', spinnin' / [00:28.35]Uh, turn around, turn it up, talk a bit / [00:32.10]Zip it up, lock you in, and close it up / [00:36.65]Yup / [00:37.18]Everybody's coming for you, wake up / [00:41.53]Everybody's coming, wake up / [00:45.92]Bodies dropping everywhere, I'm waist up / [00:50.32]Everybody's coming, wake up / [00:55.05]Some days I'm a ch-chameleon / [00:57.25]Switch it up when I crawl the ceilin' / [00:59.41]Flip it upside down, I'm wheelin' / [01:01.64]Dealin' / [01:03.53]Every single one of you is coming to my mind / [01:05.78]Bring them all together, can you stack them in a line? / [01:07.95]Jealousy is gonna be your failure, not mine / [01:10.44]Winnin' / [01:12.32]Uh, turn around, turn it up, talk a bit / [01:16.19]Zip it up, lock you in, and close it up / [01:21.21]Everybody's coming for you, wake up / [01:25.56]Everybody's coming, wake up / [01:29.96]Bodies dropping everywhere, I'm waist up / [01:34.31]Everybody's coming, wake up / [01:43.13]Everybody's coming, wake up / [01:47.84]Got a case of the take or leave it / [01:50.06]Give an inch and I'm bound to seize it / [01:52.24]Take a chainsaw out and feed it / [01:56.63]Come alive when you don't believe it / [01:58.86]Write me off and I'd love to read it / [02:01.04]Spit your words and I'll watch you eat it / [02:03.26]Diggin' / [02:07.45]Everybody's coming for you, wake up / [02:11.81]Everybody's coming, wake up / [02:16.24]Bodies dropping everywhere, I'm waist up / [02:20.61]Everybody's coming, wake up / [02:29.41]Everybody's coming, wake up / [02:33.83]What are you to do / [02:36.03]When they come for you? / [02:38.24]Winners hate to lose
